item.title: Research
item.description: Current Work Probing the Nature of Black Holes with LISA Graduate Research Project at UVA Department of Physics Charlottesville, VA. Advisor: Dr. Kent Yagi Previous Work Understanding the Correlation between Solar Atmosphere Abundances and F10.7 Radio Emission Graduate Research Project at UVA Department of Astronomy and NRAO in Charlottesville, VA. Advisor: Dr. Tim Bastian Gamma-rays from Jupiter NSF Research Experience for Undergraduates at the American Museum of Natural History in New York, NY.

item.title: Teaching
item.description: University of Virginia Head Teaching Assistant ASTR 1290 - Black Holes ASTR 3420 - Life Beyond Earth ASTR 1210 - Introduction to the Sky and Solar System ASTR 3410 - Archaeo-Astronomy ASTR 2120 - Introduction to Astrophysics II (instructor of record) ASTR 2110 - Introduction to Astrophysics I New Jersey Institute of Technology PHYS 121 - Physics II Introductory Electromagnetism PHYS 111 - Physics I Introductory Electromagnetism Mathematics Tutor - Precalc.
